comment.author: Meaghan
comment.text: The ones that don't care about the rising cost of Obamacare are the ones that get it free ðŸ˜¡

replies.author: Patrick
replies.text: Costs are going up and the penalties are going up. Our Medicare coverage is going to be reduced to pay for Obamacare. Young and old Will be effected. Not sure if our supplement insurance will cover up Medicare doesn't. We may have to pay out our pockets.

replies.author: Meaghan
replies.text: I totally understand! It is so hard to see my poor little Mom that worked 2 & 3 jobs at one time most of her life having to decide whether she is going to put what little money she has left after paying rent, utilities, and insurance to buy her medicine or food ðŸ˜¢
